description: You can shape these rolls however you prefer; an assortment of shapes looks attractive in a basket.
keywords: Rolls,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Dinner Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the milk to the boil. Put 4 tbs into a small bowl and sprinkle with the yeast. Leave for 5 minutes to dissolve, stirring once. Add the butter and sugar to the remaining milk in the pan until melted. Cool to warm.

In a bowl, lightly beat the eggs. Add the sweetened milk, salt, and dissolved yeast. Gradually stir in the flour to get a soft, slightly sticky dough. Knead on a floured surface for 5-7 minutes until elastic.
Put in a greased bowl, cover, and leave in a warm place for 1-1 1 / 2 hours until doubled in size. Grease 2 baking sheets. Put the dough on a floured surface and knock it back. Cut into 16 pieces.
For round rolls, roll a piece to form a smooth ball. For a knot, roll into a rope, then shape into an “8”. For a “snail”, wind into a spiral.

Put on the baking sheets. Leave in a warm place for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 220°C (Gas 7). Beat the yolk with 1 tbs of water, brush the rolls, and sprinkle with poppy seeds (if using). Bake for 15-18 minutes. Serve warm.
